shortDescription: Unspecified vulnerability in multiple JustSystems Ichitaro products allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted JTD document, as exploited in the wild in August 2008.
vulnerabilityName: justsystems ichitaro Improper Control of Generation of Code ('Code Injection')
required_action: Apply remediations or mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if remediation or mitigations are unavailable.
